channel.title: How do I change IP to clientsettings.java?
channel.description:
"before you run the Client please change the ip in ClientSettings.java
Afther that run the Compiler and you're done"
I am a noob and I dont know what to do? Please help I want to create my own rsps.
THANKS! :D

item.title: How do I change IP to clientsettings.java?
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

You use the “run.bat” executable to start the server and client, the “compile.bat” or "build.bat is used for invoking the Java compiler to compile the source code into byte code for the JVM to run. Make sure you have the latest Java version installed, I will provide a link below. When programming your server and client you will use the files with the associated file extension “.java”, the other file extension you will find is “.class” you won’t create this file, when you run the batch script it will invoke javac.exe to compile your source code into byte code for the JVM “java.exe” to run.

If you need any more information on how to start a server please post in this thread with a new reply.

Latest Java for developing with:
http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/jdk7-downloads-1880260.html

This download is for the development kit, you need it to compile the source code. The JDK also comes with the JVM so you won’t need to download it, I suggest you read the tutorial on how to start a server in the tutorial section to get more information!

Read full topic
item.source: How do I change IP to clientsettings.java?
